description: Industries in the Repair and Maintenance subsector restore machinery, equipment, and other products to working order. These establishments also typically provide general or routine maintenance (i.e., servicing) on such products to ensure they work efficiently and to prevent breakdown and unnecessary repairs.
name: BLS-NAICS-811

values.description: The Craftsman story began more than 40 years ago at a single repair shop just off Cambie Street in Vancouver. Young entrepreneur Bill Hatswell envisioned a different type of autobody repair experience for customers â€“ a service that would be would be more professional, more businesslike, and in a cleaner, more tasteful environment. By putting the customer at the centre of the repair process, Craftsman has steadily grown into the leading collision repair provider across Western Canada, with more customers than any other autobody repair chain by far.
